Desc.entry: A registered charity dedicated to helping children and young people cope with bereavement and loss. Gives advice and training to adults who have a responsibility for helping children and young people. Holds seminars, workshops and conferences as appropriate. Self or any referral.

Pubs.entry: Gone Forever: Helping Children and Young People Cope With Bereavement and Loss, booklet; Brochures and information; Directory of Bereavement Services in local area; Beliefs and Death Rites - Different Ethnic and Religious Approaches
